text:
Ci | Melbourne, Australia | Full-time

Embedded developer / interface designer. We design + create integrated systems for modern, connected environments. Our projects range from building intelligence to immersive telepresence to large format display solutions. Here's some drone footage of a real-time rendered 50,000px wide, 0.5km long screen we recently put into the MCG: https://ciasia.box.com/project-ribbon-video. More projects over at http://ciasia.com.au/whatwedo.

For the full description and to apply see http://www.seek.com.au/job/29283437.
